reviews.review_msg: Dr. Yellowhorn makes his TA do all the work for his course. He is not accessible via email, despite the course being distance-ed. The workload for the 100-level course is obscene and up to the final paper, I was getting an A+. He gave me a low mark despite performing well for the entirety of the course. He also gives no feedback for his grade..

The workload for this class was beyond what i expected for a 100 level class and took up more time than my 400 level BUS courses. Weekly workbook assignments took forever to finish due to the absurd amount of readings and videos, some of which are over 2 hours. The book review had no grading criteria and left you confused with the grade you got.

Dr. Yellowhorn is fine but he takes forever to grade his papers. I took this course distance-ed so I haven't had any contact with him throughout the course, not sure how much he even creates within it. The TA has marked and made all announcements so far, he is only grading our final paper. It's been almost three weeks and no mark yet.. seriously?
